title: Mystery gifts for the bilgewater Event
body: When are you guys (riot) releasing the free mystery skins if you purchased skins between the Event? cause i haven't recieved my skins and was wondering when will that be cause in the article it said by August 12?

replies.body: The article actually says "Youâ€™ll receive them within a week of the event ending."  The event ended on the 10th, so they should be out before the end of this week. :D

Hi HollyMonster,

would you kindly have someone or yourself look into this topic?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/6OTasPIE-oceania-servers-need-to-be-fixed

Wish I could help you, but that's a tech issue and I have no experience with tech stuff.

My suggestion would be for you to write a ticket into support and a tech specialist can help you out.
